SHUBERT.dev_comment: The Shubert function has many local minima, making it a challenging benchmark for optimization algorithms. Global minima depend on dimensionality.
SHUBERT.reference: @article{shubert1972optimization, title={A Sequential Method Seeking the Global Maximum of a Function}, author={Shubert, BH}, journal={Springer Optimization}, year={1972}}
SHUBERT.summary: Multimodal and continuous function with a global minimum dependent on the number of dimensions.
